name: Pick.it Supplies
description: Took on client project for three Philadelphia hospitals to develop an inventory tracking and management web and mobile app, generating annual savings of $2 million through reduced waste and increased efficiency

name: Drug Discovery Research
description: Published research over two years for a set of predictive and generative models (SVM, KNN, random forest, deep learning, and an LSTM model) to predict and generate new peptide-based drugs for cancer

name: Pennbook
description: Launched a social media platform for Penn students to connect, with messaging, friends, posts, and news functionalities deployed to an EC2 instance

name: Philly Insights
description: Designed an application that allows users to analyze crime and property trends in Philadelphia. Built with signup/login, data visualization, and analysis features.

name: Ticker Predictor
description: Trained stock prediction models that uses an LSTM model and Alpha Vantage API to predict stock prices based on fundamental and technical analysis

name: Water Scarcity Hackathon
description: Submission for the Xylem Water Hackathon. Built a convolutional neural network to project future water scarcity heatmaps in the next five years
